description:
exp/locale/collate: use gofmt -w -s (rather than just gofmt -w)

Also: apply gofmt -w -s to existing tables.

messages.text:
Hello mpvl@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=55a35bbadf98 ***

exp/locale/collate: use gofmt -w -s (rather than just gofmt -w)

Also: apply gofmt -w -s to existing tables.

R=mpvl, minux.ma, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6611051

i don't know this code, only a minor suggestion.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6611051/diff/4001/src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/tables.go
File src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/tables.go (left):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6611051/diff/4001/src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/tables.go#oldcode11
src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/tables.go:11: "af": tableIndex{
this file is auto generated, so it makes sense to fix exp/locale/collate/build/table.go and regen this file instead.

PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/6611051/diff/4001/src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/tables.go
File src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/tables.go (left):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6611051/diff/4001/src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/tables.go#oldcode11
src/pkg/exp/locale/collate/tables.go:11: "af": tableIndex{
On 2012/10/05 16:47:49, minux wrote:
> this file is auto generated, so it makes sense to fix
> exp/locale/collate/build/table.go and regen this file instead.

good point

LGTM
